# content

**Instance Property**

The content type and related value of the text item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var content: UITextItem.Content { get }
```

## Specifying the content type

- **UITextItem.Content**: Constants that describe and capture the type of content a text item represents along with a specific related value.
